Comment: What the article says:  > A Gulf diplomatic source, who declined to be named or disclose his position, told The Media Line, "President Donald Trump will issue a declaration regarding the State of Palestine and American recognition of it, and that there will be the establishment of a Palestinian state without the presence of Hamas."   So the source is not saying that Trump will recognize the state of Palestine.  The source is saying that Trump will say something regarding recognition.  It could be recognition, it could be a promise to recognize if some deal is struck, or even something more vague than that.
